content: I'm trying to find some new shows to watch, but I'm not sure what's good. I've been really into Netflix lately, just finished "Stranger Things" season 4 and now I'm watching "The Crown". By the way, I started watching the "Daily Dose of Laughter" playlist on Peacock while getting ready for work in the morning, it's such a great way to start the day. Can you recommend some popular comedies or dramas on Netflix that I might like?
